## Article Content

HOME
OFFERS & DISCOUNTS
Offers & Discounts

Offers can include service, product, and sale-level discounts that can be applied during checkout.

Set up exclusive offers that are available for a limited time only (e.g. holiday discounts)

Create offer codes (promo codes) for clients to enter in online booking

Include promo codes in your campaigns and automated flows to help boost bookings and reward loyal clients

You can add multiple discounts to an offer and specify which sales are eligible.

Exclude certain services or products from an offer

Use an offer to reward clients with a free service or product

Set up offers that can only be used at certain locations or on sales with a minimum subtotal

Once your offers are set up, you can track offer usage through detailed reports. Track how often an offer was used, see which sales included an offer, and more.

To enable the Offers app, go to Apps > Manage apps > Offers and select Enable.

The articles in this section cover offers, including creating offers, applying offers during checkout, and more.

In this section:
Creating an Offer
Applying an Offer
